activities:
Company operates a global trading exchange for commercial insurance and reinsurance. It maintains contractual relationships with users of its service and offers them access to the trading system. By contract, the company is obligated to protect all personal data it may receive from or about its subscribers.
The company also engages in software development contracts for customers. Disposition of any data received by the company from its clients is strictly governed by contract.
eucountries: Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom
